item.name: Server connections ratio
item.description: Opened connections to total connections ratio. In percents

trigger_prototype.name: [{#DBNAME}] Cache hit ratio is too low
trigger_prototype.description: Cache hit ratio of last 5 minutes is too low

trigger_prototype.name: [{#DBNAME}] DB Size is too large
trigger_prototype.description: Cache hit ratio of last 5 minutes is too low

trigger.name: PostgreSQL is using more than 70% of allowed connections
PostgreSQL is using more than 80% of allowed connections
PostgreSQL is using more than 90% of allowed connections
trigger.description: Pound in the bell when connections ratio is more than 90%
